summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6112 for the improvement of West Willow Street from 34th Avenue Southwest to 35th Avenue Southwest; and certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 84411, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
